sect2.title: Int
sect2.para: Zend_Filter_Int allows you to transform a sclar value which contains into an integer.

sect3.title: Supported options for Zend_Filter_Int
sect3.para: There are no additional options for Zend_Filter_Int.

sect3.title: Basic usage
sect3.para: A basic example of usage is below:
sect3.programlisting:
$filter = new Zend_Filter_Int();
print $filter->filter('-4 is less than 0');
